data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 11,776 believers in Conakry to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Conakry, Guinea

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Conakry, Guinea.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Conakry that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Conakry access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Soninke people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Conakry to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Conakry.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.section_summary:
the state of Conakry, Guinea has a population of 1,661,000.

We estimate Conakry has 11,776 people who might know Jesus, 57,810 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,591,414 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 141 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Conakry to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

location.name: Conakry
location.people_groups_list: Jahanka, Baga Koga, Kakabe, Manya, Mandingo, Landoma
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Jahanka (37,000), Baga Koga (5,000), Kakabe (13,000), Manya, Mandingo (83,000), Landoma (27,000)
